metadata.title: CVE-2019-11767 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Server side request forgery (SSRF) in phpBB before 3.2.6 allows checkingfor the existence of files and services on the local network of the hostthrough the remote avatar upload function.

criterions.comment: phpbb3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
